name: Tanishka
wishText: Happy Birthday Tanishka. I hope your day is filled with technology hacks and plenty of coding. Have fun! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy returns of the day!
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: If I could rearrange the alphabet, I'd put U and I together.
replayText: If you loved this please let me know
